meanings.definition: A type of durable, yellowish cotton fabric.
meanings.sent1: She wore a nankeen dress to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The curtains were made of nankeen material.
meanings.sent3: The nankeen fabric was so tough, it could withstand any adventure.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like nankeen, strong and unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The nankeen cloth gleamed in the sunlight, a beacon of resilience.

meanings.sent1: The walls of the nursery were painted in a soft nankeen hue.
meanings.sent2: The artist used nankeen to add a touch of warmth to the painting.
meanings.sent3: The nankeen color of the sky at dawn was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as nankeen, radiating joy to all around her.
meanings.sent5: The fields of wheat shimmered in the nankeen light of the setting sun.

meanings.definition: A type of pant made from nankeen fabric.
meanings.sent1: He bought a pair of nankeen pants for the hiking trip.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer showcased a collection of nankeen trousers.
meanings.sent3: The nankeen pants were so comfortable, it felt like wearing a cloud.
meanings.sent4: In his nankeen attire, he felt ready to conquer the world.
meanings.sent5: The nankeen trousers swished softly as she walked, a gentle rustling sound.
